message:
Running command: applypatch << 'PATCH'
*** Begin Patch
*** Update File: matplotlib/lib/matplotlib/ft2font.py
@@
 def _get_font(*args, **kwargs):
     return FT2Font()
@@
 FT2Font = FT2Font
+ 
+# Minimal FT2Image used by mathtext backends in this kata.
+class FT2Image:
+    def __init__(self, w, h):
+        self.width = int(w)
+        self.height = int(h)
+
+    def draw_rect_filled(self, x1, y1, x2, y2):
+        pass
+
+    def __repr__(self):
+        return f"<FT2Image {self.width}x{self.height}>"
*** End Patch
PATCH

function.name: execute_bash

args.command:
applypatch << 'PATCH'
*** Begin Patch
*** Update File: matplotlib/lib/matplotlib/ft2font.py
@@
 def _get_font(*args, **kwargs):
     return FT2Font()
@@
 FT2Font = FT2Font
+ 
+# Minimal FT2Image used by mathtext backends in this kata.
+class FT2Image:
+    def __init__(self, w, h):
+        self.width = int(w)
+        self.height = int(h)
+
+    def draw_rect_filled(self, x1, y1, x2, y2):
+        pass
+
+    def __repr__(self):
+        return f"<FT2Image {self.width}x{self.height}>"
*** End Patch
PATCH
